message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point!
I understand you want a larger share, but I need a bit more. How about a 55/45 split?
I can compromise, 58-42 is the most I can offer for now.
This is a fair offer considering the time pressure. Let's close the deal and avoid further losses.
I'm willing to go down a bit, but I still think I deserve the larger share.
Time is running out!  This is my final offer. Let's split the difference and get something!
You said that was your final offer, but I'm still not convinced. I'll give you a bit more, but that's it.
